Title:
Center for LifeLong Learning and Design 
at the University of Colorado, Boulder
Body: Date: Wed, 20 Nov 1996 19:34:10 GMT Server: Apache/1.1.1 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 2948 Last-modified: Thu, 07 Nov 1996 17:47:14 GMT Center for LifeLong Learning and Design at the University of Colorado, Boulder (formerly Human Computer Communication Research Group) The Center for Lifelong Learning and Design (L 3 D) is part of the Department of Computer Science and the Institute of Cognitive Science at the University of Colorado at Boulder .
